channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Splashscreen
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Splashscreen

item.title: CVE-2023-6501|2024-08-02T08:35:13.197Z -- unknown -- splashscreen
item.description: The Splashscreen WordPress plugin through 0.20 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2023-6501|2024-06-04T17:16:53.985Z -- unknown -- splashscreen
item.description: The Splashscreen WordPress plugin through 0.20 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack
